<h1 align="center">
  Gatsby's default starter + ESM imports on gatsby-node
</h1>

## ðŸš€ Quick start

1. Run `npm install --save-dev esm`
2. Update your `package.json` scripts with the following:

```
  "scripts": {
    "build": "npx --node-arg '-r esm' gatsby build",
    "develop": "npx --node-arg '-r esm' gatsby develop",
    "format": "prettier --write src/**/*.{js,jsx}",
    "start": "npm run develop",
    "serve": "npx --node-arg '-r esm' gatsby serve",
    "test": "echo \"Write tests! -> https://gatsby.app/unit-testing\""
  },
```

## ðŸ’« Deploy

[![Deploy to Netlify](https://www.netlify.com/img/deploy/button.svg)](https://app.netlify.com/start/deploy?repository=https://github.com/gatsbyjs/gatsby-starter-default)
